uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.util

Class ConvertTrace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.AbstractChromatogram
      • uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.util.ConvertTrace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.Chromatogram

    public class ConvertTrace
extends org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.AbstractChromatogram
    ConvertTrace Object to perform Trace data Channel conversion, i.e. Baselining, Mobility Correction and signal start & end removal
    Author:
    emd
